name: A Bridge Too Far
description:
* Made for Global Game Jam 2020 by Jongwoo Kim, Clement Marthe, Louis Sciannamblo and François-Xavier Bilodeau

A whimsical, ragtime 2D physics puzzler, about repairing broken bridge with whatever you can find. 

1. Fix the Bridge!
* Left Click to select and place objects.
* Scroll Wheel or Press A /D to rotate the objects before placing.

2. Begin the Crossing!
* Press the Begin Crossing button at the Top Right to see if your car will make it across!
